execution_plan.description: Retrieve all order items with their IDs and status codes from the orders database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT order_item_id, order_id, order_item_status_code FROM Order_Items;

execution_plan.description: Get shipment tracking numbers for the order items returned by step 1 by joining shipment_items to shipments (only for those order_item_id values).
execution_plan.query: SELECT si.order_item_id, s.shipment_tracking_number FROM shipment_items si INNER JOIN shipments s ON si.shipment_id = s.shipment_id WHERE si.order_item_id IN ($step1.order_item_id);
